column5: This course is now closed for January 2022 applications.Accounting data and analysis lies at the very heart of good management. It provides vital information for investors and other external parties, and brings clarity to major decision-making in business management. If you have a business-related degree and want to develop your understanding of accounting and management in a business context, our Accounting and Business Management MSc is for you.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: Full time: 1 year | Part time: 15 months
